name: Sholo Guti
description:
A simple South Asian board game called Sholo Guti, also known as sixteen soldiers.

Click on the Red Pawns to highlight locations that pawn can jump to. Click on the yellow highlights to jump to a certain position. 

Capture enemy pawns by jumping to a location immediately behind them.

Player that captures all sixteen enemy pawns wins.

The enemy AI, (Green) is an Artificial Intelligence that has been trained using the Proximal Policy Optimization Algorithm.
